title: WTB - Just about any T216 Kotton card

posts.post_title: WTB - Just about any T216 Kotton card
posts.post_content:
As many of you know I'm working on a T216 Kotton set.

If you have anything available please pm me with what you have along with your price... even if its an absurd price.

Thanks!

posts.post_title: Re: WTB - Just about any T216 Kotton card

posts.post_content: I've picked up a few but I'm still working on a set
